content: If I have two implementation guides (A and B), and B depends on A, what properties reflect where IG A is ultimately deployed to? In other words, if I use "dev" on an IG in my local environment, it automatically sets the url of dependent profiles to file://XXXX and I'd like to have control over that. I suspect I do have control over that, but don't know which properties are used for that...
other than in the ig dependency element?
Is it just ImplementationGuide.dependsOn.uri that is used to influence published URLs to profiles in the dependency?
can it be any uri? i.e. some arbitrary http://XXXXX location of where the IG will ultimately live?
the links come from the package the guide depends on
which is from a parameter -publish [url] passed when running the ig
